content: Which infamous pirate supposedly buried his treasure along the east coast of North America, but it has never been found?

Ah, you're referring to the legendary pirate treasure! There are many tales of pirates burying their loot, but one name that often comes up is Captain Kidd. He was an Irish pirate who operated in the late 17th century, and there are stories that he buried his treasure along the east coast of North America, possibly on Gardiner's Island off Long Island, New York. However, despite numerous searches, his treasure has never been found. It's become a part of pirate lore and continues to fascinate people to this day.
